Transform Your Space with Expert Flooring Installation

The right flooring sets the foundation for your entire room's design. At Custom Kitchens & Baths by Lopez, we specialize in professional tile and flooring installation that combines aesthetic appeal with long-lasting performance.

Whether you're dreaming of a spa-like bathroom with heated marble floors, a kitchen with easy-to-clean porcelain tile, or warm hardwood throughout your home, our expert installers bring your vision to life with precision and care.

Serving Monmouth County for over 20 years, we've installed thousands of square feet of flooring in homes from historic Victorians in Red Bank to modern estates in Colts Neck. Our experience means your project is done right the first time.

Flooring Options for Every Style & Budget

From classic to contemporary, we offer a wide range of flooring materials to suit your lifestyle, design preferences, and budget.

Ceramic & Porcelain Tile

Versatile and durable options perfect for kitchens, bathrooms, and high-traffic areas.

Key Benefits:

  • Water resistant
  • Easy maintenance
  • Endless design options
  • Suitable for radiant heat
Best for:

Bathrooms, kitchens, entryways

Investment:

$3-$15 per sq ft installed

Natural Stone

Timeless elegance with marble, travertine, slate, and granite tiles.

Key Benefits:

  • Unique natural patterns
  • Increases home value
  • Extremely durable
  • Cool underfoot
Best for:

Luxury bathrooms, formal areas

Investment:

$8-$25 per sq ft installed

Hardwood Flooring

Classic beauty that adds warmth and value to any room in your home.

Key Benefits:

  • Timeless appeal
  • Can be refinished
  • Adds home value
  • Natural warmth
Best for:

Living areas, bedrooms, dining rooms

Investment:

$6-$18 per sq ft installed

Luxury Vinyl Plank

Modern technology delivers wood and stone looks with superior performance.

Key Benefits:

  • 100% waterproof
  • Scratch resistant
  • Comfortable underfoot
  • DIY friendly
Best for:

Basements, bathrooms, entire home

Investment:

$4-$10 per sq ft installed

Popular Tile Patterns & Layouts

The right pattern can transform ordinary tile into a stunning design feature. We expertly install all patterns, from classic to contemporary.

Herringbone

Classic zigzag pattern adds movement and elegance

Subway

Timeless brick pattern, perfect for backsplashes and showers

Hexagon

Modern geometric look gaining popularity

Basketweave

Traditional pattern perfect for vintage styles

Chevron

V-shaped pattern creates visual interest

Diagonal

Makes small spaces appear larger

Need help choosing the perfect pattern for your space?

Our Professional Installation Process

Quality installation is the difference between floors that last decades and those that fail within years. Our proven process ensures lasting beauty and performance.

1

Design Consultation

Explore materials, patterns, and layouts that complement your space and style.

2

Surface Preparation

Proper subfloor preparation ensures a level surface and lasting installation.

3

Layout Planning

Strategic tile placement minimizes cuts and creates balanced, beautiful patterns.

4

Professional Installation

Precise cutting, proper spacing, and expert techniques ensure flawless results.

5

Grouting & Sealing

Color-matched grout and proper sealing protect your investment.

6

Final Details

Transitions, trim work, and thorough cleanup complete your project.

Why Monmouth County Trusts Us with Their Flooring

Master Craftsmen

Our installers are true artisans with years of specialized training. We handle complex patterns, custom inlays, and challenging layouts with expertise.

Proper Preparation

We never cut corners on substrate preparation. Level surfaces, moisture barriers, and proper underlayment ensure your floors perform beautifully for decades.

Premium Materials

We partner with leading manufacturers and use only professional-grade adhesives, grouts, and sealers. Quality materials mean lasting results.

Clean Job Sites

We protect your home during installation and leave it cleaner than we found it. Daily cleanup and final detailing are standard with every project.

Common Questions About Tile & Flooring

How long does tile installation take?

Most bathroom floors can be completed in 2-3 days, while larger areas like kitchens may take 3-5 days. This includes surface preparation, installation, grouting, and sealing. The area must cure for 24-48 hours before use.

What's the best flooring for bathrooms?

Porcelain and ceramic tiles are ideal for bathrooms due to their water resistance. Luxury vinyl plank is another excellent waterproof option. Natural stone like marble adds luxury but requires more maintenance.

Can you install tile over existing flooring?

In some cases, yes. We can install tile over existing tile, vinyl, or hardwood if the surface is stable and level. However, removing old flooring often provides better results and prevents height issues.

How do I choose the right tile size?

Larger tiles (12"x24" or bigger) make spaces feel larger and have fewer grout lines. Smaller tiles work better for shower floors and curved areas. We help you choose sizes that complement your space.

What's included in your flooring installation service?

Our service includes material delivery, old floor removal if needed, subfloor preparation, professional installation, grouting/sealing, transition strips, and complete cleanup. We handle every aspect of your project.
